name: Jelly Express
description:
Welcome to the jelly world's grand celebration! You and your buddy will become cute little jellies on the brink of adulthood and will embark on a challenging journey! Get ready to work together on your missions: to get those packages delivered to their destination!

The only tool at your disposal is the board on top of your head. But fear not! Use your stretchy, jumping & moving abilities to keep the package steady on the board, Remember, try not to break the package! The better the condition, the greater the rewards! Let's go, jelly squad!

Explore Jellyland!

Explore a beautiful world full of fun and challenges! Huge gardens with intricate machinery, bask in warm beaches and chase the elusive deep sea creatures, venture into the depths of caves and rainforests loved by adventurers! Each world's unique and special challenges awaits!

Get ready for some chaos!

We gotta stick together and be brave! Move, stretch, and jump! When you do it together, it's a true team effort! (But it won't be that easy also) By utilizing the power of jelly stretching and working together with your closest buddy, teamwork is key!

Jelly, jelly everywhere!

Who wouldn't love jelly? Unlock over 30 unique hats and show off your jelly fashion!



(Just be careful that they might fall off!)

Join our community
Twitter & Discord
